name: createUUID
description:
Creates a Universally Unique Identifier (UUID). A UUID is a
 35-character string representation of a unique 128-bit integer
 xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx : x is a hexadecimal digit (8-4-4-16).
 SQL Server UUIDs are similar but have a format of 8-4-4-4-12.

examples.title: Creates a Universally Unique Identifier (UUID).  Each UUID will be unique
